entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
